landing.title: AI Citations & Formatting with
landing.subtitle: Tired of doomscrolling Google Scholar?
landing.description: Get Instant, Accurate, Formatted References - Just Ask CiteMe!
landing.smartGenerationDesc: Simply describe what you need to cite and let our AI do the work
landing.instantResultsDesc: Select your formatting style and we'll copy it to your clipboard ready to paste
landing.aiAccuracyDesc: Our advanced AI ensures your citations are accurate and properly formatted every time.
landing.multipleStylesDesc: Support for APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, and more citation formats.
landing.saveOrganizeDesc: Create a personal library of citations and access them anytime, anywhere.
landing.realStudiesDesc: All studies and citations are 100% real. You just get them instantly.
landing.choosePlanDesc: Get instant access to AI-powered citations and formatting

reviews.sophie: I was always getting confused with different citation formats, and my professors are super strict about it. CiteMe has been a lifesaver - especially when I'm close to a deadline. It's so fast, accurate, and saves me a ton of stress!
reviews.alex: I used to spend ages searching for proper studies to reference for my dissertations, but now I can get them sorted in seconds. It's brilliant to use, and the extension does all the hard graft. My essays have never looked better!
reviews.liam: I love how simple CiteMe is. I just say what I want to prove and it finds a study AND formats it perfectly every time. The only thing I wish is that it would write my assignments too!
reviews.emily: CiteMe has saved me so much time, especially when juggling multiple assignments. The citation finder is a lifesaver, and I no longer worry about messing up my references. A must-have for any college student!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.howToUseAnswer: Just sign up below, subscribe, and either use our web app straight away or download the Chrome extension if you prefer that.
faq.willTeachersKnow: Will my teachers know I used it?
faq.willTeachersKnowAnswer: No. A classmate could have the exact same citation as you. They're both legitimate. The only difference, you got there 100x quicker.
faq.whyUseAnswer: Every student knows the relentless pain of doomscrolling the internet for studies to cite, and we take that burden away.
faq.whatIfDontLike: What if I don't like it?
faq.whatIfDontLikeAnswer: We are pretty sure you'll love it, but on the off chance you don't, you can cancel your plan anytime on the help page. We offer a 100% money back guarantee on your first payment.

auth.signUpDesc: Sign up and complete payment to get instant citations, automatically formatted and ready to use
auth.signInDesc: Sign in to get new citations and access your citation library
auth.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
auth.dontHaveAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
auth.existingUser: Existing Chrome Extension User? Create an account with the SAME EMAIL you used to sign up to the chrome extension, and your membership will be added here. You'll also be able to access and manage your subscription here.
auth.checkEmail: Check your email for password reset instructions.

citation.generateDesc: Generate accurate citations for your academic work
citation.placeholder: e.g., I need a citation that proves oceans are warming
citation.additionalParamsDesc: Add anything you need here in free text
citation.copyDesc: Copy this citation and paste it directly into your work

account.title: Account Settings
account.desc: Manage your subscription and account details
account.redirectInfo: To manage your subscription, you'll be redirected to our secure payment partner, Stripe.
account.useEmail: Use the same email address you signed up with
